usage_instructions.import_single: Copy one config object and paste into the import dialog
usage_instructions.import_multiple: Save any config as a .json file and use the import button

usage_instructions.image_urls: Replace image URLs with your own avatar or logo

tips.title_length: Keep titles under 60 characters for optimal display
tips.image_size: Use images at least 400x400px for best quality
tips.testing: Always test your OG images across different social platforms
